Text: Anyone that's downloaded that could give some feedback to make sure it works would be appreciated. I figure the MPEG Encoder dirvers are pretty generic for all the sony boards, and it these work with mine. I'd like to see how it works with the rest.
Don't bother trying the Sony Online Chat support. They'll just pass the buck to Microsoft and they'll refuse to give you a download link.
Also it didn't work on my system which is a Sony Vaio VGC-RB38G with Windows XP Media Center Edition 2005 SP2.
